points: Building an IOT based product ,user based dashboard with svelte(sapper), express, mongodb , influx db, AWS IOT.

Building an app called Digital Rasid for playstore. Initially used svelte kit, mongodb, tailwindcss with capacitorjs. Later removed capacitor(missed ssr) and used Trusted Web Activity (TWA) to convert website to an android app.
Worked on a blockchain based project.Responsible for backend(hyperledger sawtooth, node js ,express js) and frontend((HTML, CSS, Javascript).
Worked on an IOT project with sensor data from factory.Wrote code(python3) to send sensor data using Azure IOT Hub and Azure functions which were used for analysis.
Went to Myanmar to work for a leading bank.
I used django framework to write backend and integrate frontend files for different projects.
Used Experian APIs for a project to generate credit score of users.
I worked on django framework, writing logic for a vehicle tracing project.
